TopicTitle: Does is possible to asteroid hit Kerbin

Articles.Content:
I must admit i never try to play with the ARM stuff aside the training mission, it's to difficult to me. 

But i wonder does is possible to destroy Kerbin?

Something like this ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZOZ9_a-hJJU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Does you can improve de grammerz?

On a more serious note, no. You can level KSC with a Class-A, though.

You can make an Asteroid hit the planet, but it doesn't do much. As mentioned by the grammar nanny, if you hit KSC buildings with one, they'd fall down. 

> 
> Does you can improve de grammerz?

How's your Polish? Is it perfect?

> How's your Polish? Is it perfect?

Mine's pretty good.

Now you mention it. Asteroids had a tendency to "float" down to Kerbin because of the soup-o-sphere. And that was kind of a disappointment really. Because you expect a boulder the size of a few buildings with a combined weight heavier than "yo mama" (Sorry I had to say that ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif). Forgive me) to come down pretty fast! But now with the new aero of 1.0.3 and all, things probably changed for the better. Have to try that out once I have the time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
